title: User Management
description: Manage all users in the system, including viewing user information and managing user status

search.placeholder: Search by email, username or name

confirm.suspend: Are you sure you want to suspend this user?
confirm.suspendDescription: After suspension, the user will not be able to login or use the system
confirm.activate: Are you sure you want to activate this user?
confirm.activateDescription: After activation, the user can login and use the system normally
